title: KulturKantine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Buffet, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers an inexpensive weekday lunch with mainly vegetarian items. Or choose from a la carte. On Friday night volunteer cooks tapas and special dishes. On Sunday a brunch for family. On Thursday morning offers for single mothers, and Thursday evening open salsa dance 8-11pm (no kitchen).
